text: Choice of ramp or stairs, with resting stations along the way. A nice place for an impromptu cardio work out or just to get from east coast to bedok. Very green, of course, and some of the benches have shade. Ramps are not too steep for a wheelchair user.
Great addition. In the 1980s, this was just simple stairs ending in a dirt path with wooden planks to cover the mud.
Unique. Friendly for those elderly on wheelchair or mobility device
